item.title: YouTube: Editor & Thumbnail-Designer - Upwork
item.description:
Video-Editing und Graphic-Design für YouTube gesucht!

Ich möchte gerne regelmäßig Videos auf meinem YouTube-Channel veröffentlichen und brauche dafür Support bei:

- Videoschnitt
- Intro & Outro
- Optional: B-Roll-Videos einbauen
- Thumbnail-Design & Erstellung

Im besten Fall kannst du auch zusätzlich:

- Accountmanagement übernehmen (Upload der Videos etc.)
- aus dem Long-Form Video kurze Videos für Instagram & Co. schneiden

*Letzteres ist eher "nice to have", aber kein muss.

Wichtig: Die Videos sind alle auf Deutsch, d.h. dein Deutsch sollte entweder auf Muttlersprachler-Niveau oder fließend sein.

Du solltest bereits Erfahrungen im Videoschnitt und Graphic-Design mitbringen und Interesse an der Plattform YouTube haben, um dich damit zu beschäftigen, was wirklich funktioniert (Thumbnail-Designs, Wording...).

Ich suche hier eine langfristige Unterstützung, ggf. später auch mit mehr Aufgaben im Bereich Video-Schnitt und Design.

Mir ist wichtig, dass du eigenständig und selbstverantwortlich arbeiten kannst und bereit bist in dem Bereich auch noch mehr zu lernen bzw. zu experimentieren und selbst Vorschläge zur Verbesserung einzubringen.

Falls es dich interessiert: Ich arbeite als Mentalcoach mit Spitzensportlern und Führungskräften & Unternehmern zusammen. Alle Videos werden sich also thematisch in dem Bereich bewegen.



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 11:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:360-Degree Video Editing, YouTube, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: 360-Degree Video Editing, YouTube, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Country: Germany
click to apply

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00

item.title: Video Ad Producer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Ad Producer to help us create engaging and high-quality video ads. Your main responsibilities will include reviewing our content, brainstorming ideas and angles for video ads, and executing the production process. As a Video Ad Producer, you will need to have a keen eye for detail, a creative mindset, and strong technical skills in video editing and production.

  Responsibilities:
  - Reviewing existing content and identifying opportunities for video ads
  - Collaborating with the team to brainstorm creative ideas and angles for video ads
  - Executing the production process, including editing and post-production
  - Ensuring the final video ads meet high-quality standards and brand guidelines

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience in video production, including filming and editing
  - Strong knowledge of video editing software and tools
  -  Strong understanding of advertising techniques + trends
  - Excellent attention to detail and ability to bring creative ideas to life
  - Ability to work collaboratively and meet deadlines

If you are a creative professional with a passion for video production and advertising, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:58 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Content Video Creator for Social Media Platforms - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Content Video Creator who specializes in creating engaging videos for TikTok, Facebook, and Snapchat. Your primary responsibility will be to repurpose existing video content and quickly edit it to fit the specific requirements of each platform. This includes rotating and optimizing the content for maximum impact. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the unique video formats and trends on these social media platforms. If you have a creative eye, excellent video editing skills, and a passion for social media, we would love to work with you.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Content repurposing
- Knowledge of TikTok, Facebook, and Snapchat video formats
- Creative thinking
- Attention to detail

Hourly Range: $4.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Content Creator Needed for Star Pack Products - Long and Short Form Videos & High-Quality Stills - Upwork
item.description:
Star Pack Products is seeking a talented content creator to produce engaging content that highlights our innovative kitchen products. If you have a knack for creating visually appealing videos and images, we would love to hear from you!

Deliverables:
Long Form Video:
1x video up to 4-5 minutes, divided into 3 sections.
Short Form Videos:
3x videos, each representing one of the sections from the Long Form video.
High-Quality Stills:
6x images captured during filming (e.g., close-ups of food in containers, organized fridge with StarPack products, and other innovative ways to feature StarPack products).
Call to Action:
Include a call to action with a discount code in the video description and end screen.

Compensation:
$150 + Gifted products

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating high-quality videos and images.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and content trends.
Ability to showcase products in a creative and appealing manner.

How to Apply:
Please submit your portfolio along with a brief description of your experience. Highlight any relevant projects you have worked on that demonstrate your ability to create compelling content.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:37 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MOV, MP4, How To, Short Video Ad, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: MOV, MP4, How To, Short Video Ad, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: High-level Video editor w/ Motion Graphics Experience - Upwork
item.description:
IN THIS ROLE YOU WILL:

Edit and assemble complex video projects with a focus on clarity, storytelling, and visual impact.

Apply advanced editing techniques and color grading to achieve a professional and polished final product.

Integrate motion graphics elements seamlessly within video content.

Design and animate engaging motion graphics elements to enhance video content.

Utilize industry-standard software (e.g., After Effects) to create titles, animations, and other visual assets.

Collaborate with the creative team to develop and implement the overall visual style of the project.

Provide feedback on scripts, storyboards, and other pre-production materials.

Foster a collaborative and productive working environment.

YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE IF YOU HAVE/ARE:

Motion graphics experience

At least 3 yrs of experience as a video editor

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU:

Room for career development that may involve additional hours

Hourly Range: $11.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:30 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Experienced Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor proficient in CapCut or Adobe Premiere to edit a 7-8 minute documentary video for our company academy. This project is for a single video, but a positive review from the management could lead to a broader project (15-20 similar videos over the next 6 months).

Project Details:
Video Duration: 7-8 minutes
Required Software: CapCut or Adobe Premiere
Purpose: Creation of a documentary video for the company academy

Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing with CapCut or Adobe Premiere
Ability to create engaging and professional visual narratives
Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

Included in the First Project:
A brief tutorial on the main corrective actions to enable small modifications after production.

If you are interested and possess the required skills, please send your portfolio and a brief presentation of your work experiences.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Corporate Video, CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Documentary, Corporate Video, CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Italy

item.title: YouTube Shorts Video Creator for Gambling Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented YouTube Shorts video creator who can transform our blog content into engaging short videos. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the YouTube Shorts platform and its best practices. They should be able to create visually appealing videos that effectively convey our blog content in a concise manner. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role.

Responsibilities:
- Transform blog content into YouTube Shorts videos
- Create visually appealing videos that engage and captivate viewers
- Ensure videos align with our brand guidelines and messaging

Skills:
- Strong knowledge of YouTube Shorts platform and best practices
- Creative thinking and storytelling abilities
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

We are looking for a talented individual who can consistently produce high-quality YouTube Shorts videos to drive engagement and increase brand awareness.

Please provide samples of your previous YouTube Shorts videos to be considered for this role.

Note: This is a remote position. The size of the project is medium, with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level expert in YouTube Shorts video creation.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Shorts
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Shorts
Country: Bulgaria

item.title: Video Editor & Motion Designer Needed for Skincare Brand Digital Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Video Editor and Motion Designer to join our team and collaborate on creating compelling digital ads for our skincare brand. The ideal candidate will have a strong background working in agencies, or in-house as a part of fashion or beauty brand.

Responsibilities:
Create visually stunning digital ads for our skincare products, focusing on captivating motion graphics and engaging storytelling.
Collaborate closely with our marketing team to understand brand aesthetics and campaign objectives.
Edit and optimize video content for various digital platforms, ensuring consistency across different channels.
Stay updated on industry trends and techniques to continually enhance the quality and effectiveness of our ads.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Video Editor and Motion Designer, preferably in an agency setting.
Portfolio showcasing previous work with fashion and beauty brands, demonstrating proficiency in creating visually appealing and effective digital ads.
Proficiency in industry-standard video editing software (DaVinci, Adobe Premiere Pro) and motion graphics software (Adobe After Effects).
Strong understanding of storytelling principles and ability to translate brand narratives into compelling visual content.
Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Amazing skills reflected through the layout design and kinetic typography

If you're passionate about beauty, skilled in video editing and motion design, and ready to make an impact with our skincare brand, we'd love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and any relevant links to previous work.

Note: This is a remote position.

Budget: $3,000
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: 3-4min intro video using AI editing-tools - Upwork
item.description:
I´m making a intro-video to my friends wedding. None of the other guests know they already married 1 year ago, but in stead of a speech I want to show a video:

VIDEO NEED TO BE FINISHED BY JUNE 26th
SHOULD BE EDITED USING AI EDITING -TOOLS, LIKE eg VEED etc to speed up the process.

Setup:
1) Introducing both of them. comparing the two personalities in a split screen etc.
2) Showing their history together, from a couple to a family of 5
3) Wedding spoiler: their wedding ceremony from last year

I have collected most of the clips/pictures.

The movie will not be commercial so we can use all kinds of music and pre-made animations etc. There will be no copyright.

Title: A Love Story Unfolds

Duration: 3-4 minutes

Music:

"Better Together" – Jack Johnson
"You Are the Best Thing" – Ray LaMontagne
"Beautiful Day" – U2
"My Wish" – Rascal Flatts
"Marry Me" – Train
Description:

Opening Scene: Introduction of the Couple
The film opens with the heartwarming tones of "Beautiful dayr" by  U2, setting a feelgood  atmosphere. We introduce the couple through a series of candid, side-by-side clips that highlight their distinct personalities and the undeniable connection they share. This song beautifully captures the essence of their togetherness and the happiness they find in each other’s company.

Scene 2: Life as a Couple
As the scene transitions, "You Are the Best Thing" by Ray LaMontagne begins to play. This part of the film showcases the couple’s everyday life, from simple, affectionate moments to their shared adventures. The soulful melody and lyrics emphasize the deep love and appreciation they have for one another, illustrating their strong bond and mutual admiration.

Scene 3: Expanding the Family
The upbeat and celebratory tune of "Beautiful Day" by U2 ushers in the next chapter of their story. We see the couple’s journey as they expand their family, welcoming their twin children and later a third child. The visuals capture the joy, excitement, and occasional chaos of family life, all underlined by the exhilarating spirit of the song.

Scene 4: Hopes and Dreams for Their Children
Following the lively family scenes, "My Wish" by Rascal Flatts plays softly in the background. This section focuses on the hopes and dreams the couple has for their children, capturing tender moments and milestones. The heartfelt lyrics and gentle melody underscore the love and aspirations they hold for their growing family.

Final Scene: The Wedding Ceremony
The climax of the film features their beautiful wedding ceremony, set to the romantic and timeless "Marry Me" by Train. This final scene brings the narrative full circle, as we witness their vows and the celebration of their enduring love. The song’s intimate and heartfelt words perfectly encapsulate the significance of this moment, creating a touching and memorable conclusion to their story.

End Credits:

As the film concludes, the music fades, leaving the audience with a sense of joy and fulfillment from witnessing the couple’s journey of love, partnership, and family. Pictures

I will upload clips/pictures on a shared google doc folder


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Family Video, AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Animation, Graphic Design
Skills: Family Video, AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Animation, Graphic Design
Country: Norway
click to apply

Following the lively family scenes, "My Wish" by Rascal Flatts plays softly in the background. This section focuses on the hopes and dreams the couple has for their children, capturing tender moments and milestones. The heartfelt lyrics and gentle melody underscore the love and aspirations they hold for their growing family.

Final Scene: The Wedding Ceremony
The climax of the film features their beautiful wedding ceremony, set to the romantic and timeless "Marry Me" by Train. This final scene brings the narrative full circle, as we witness their vows and the celebration of their enduring love. The song’s intimate and heartfelt words perfectly encapsulate the significance of this moment, creating a touching and memorable conclusion to their story.

End Credits:

As the film concludes, the music fades, leaving the audience with a sense of joy and fulfillment from witnessing the couple’s journey of love, partnership, and family. Pictures

I will upload clips/pictures on a shared google doc folder


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
